amendment.description: To use $10,000,000 from the Department of Justice Working Capital Fund for the expansion of Operation Streamline, the zero tolerance prosecution policy currently in place in the Del Rio and Yuma border sectors.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3283 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3283 proposed by Senator Mikulski for Senator Sessions. (consideration: CR S12913-12914; text: CR S12913) To use $10,000,000 from the Department of Justice Working Capital Fund for the expansion of Operation Streamline, the zero tolerance prosecution policy currently in place in the Del Rio and Yuma border sectors.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3283 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3283 proposed by Senator Mikulski for Senator Sessions.
